title: 1922년 Williams v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Williams v. State. 판결일: 1922-05-10. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: WILLIAMS v. STATE
**판결일**: 1922-05-10
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Hawkins

## 변호인

William H. Atwell, of Dallas, ior appellant. Jas. J. Collins, City Atty., Carl B. Callaway, and Allen Charlton, all of Dallas, and R. G. Storey, Asst. Atty. Gen., for the State.

## 인용

- 240 S.W. 1118

## 판결문 요약


HAWKINS, J.
Appellant was filed $150 for •an alleged violation of what is known as the “segregation ordinance” of the city of Dallas. There has been filed a request from appellant that the appeal be abated. The request is granted, and the appeal is dismissed.
...
